solution_line_template: Joseph has {stan_boxes} * {joseph_fewer_percent} = <<{stan_boxes}*{joseph_fewer_percent}={joseph_less_boxes}>>{joseph_less_boxes} less boxes than Stan.
Joseph has a total of {stan_boxes} - {joseph_less_boxes} = <<{stan_boxes}-{joseph_less_boxes}={joseph_boxes}>>{joseph_boxes} boxes.
John has {jules_boxes} * {john_more_percent} = <<{jules_boxes}*{john_more_percent}={john_more_boxes}>>{john_more_boxes} more boxes than Jules.
John has a total of {jules_boxes} + {john_more_boxes} = <<{jules_boxes}+{john_more_boxes}={john_boxes}>>{john_boxes} boxes
